channel.title: retrospective on Kablamo
channel.description: Recent content in retrospective on Kablamo

item.title: August 2020: I got sick
item.description: What went well last month My five year old son Learning German with Duo Lingo and Rosetta Stone each night for about 20 minutes. Reading Chinese each night for about 20 minutes. Reading English each night for about 5 minutes. What went badly last month I have been sick for 4 weeks and am still not better 100%. Back at work though. Goals for next month Health
